name: Busjäger
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

Hold left mouse and relase to throw the bus stop sign!

Catch a bus and get on!

Inspired by this comic:

Which comes from this series of comics:

http://imgur.com/a/nu4AB

I actually only had the last day to make this, so it's incredibly rough, and not really fun, sorry!

The buses and stop sign are based off of the MVG/MVV (Munich), because that was my first experience with public transit that was worth two shits.
